content: शौचं [शुचेर्भावः अण्] {@--1@} Purity, clearness; काके शौचं द्यूतकारे च सत्यं <ls>Pt. 1. 147.</ls> {@--2@} Purification from personal defilement caused by voiding excrement, but particularly by the death of a relative. {@--3@} Cleansing, purifying. {@--4@} Voiding of excrement. {@--5@} Uprightness, honesty.
